descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: The Trail Blazers come storming back as CJ McCollum hits a nice transition 3-pointer to cut the Nuggets' lead to 59-51.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McCollum sinks transition 3 to cut Denver's lead) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: McCollum sinks transition 3 to cut Denver's lead

videos.description: The Trail Blazers carry some good momentum into halftime as CJ McCollum drives to bank in a floater to beat the buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McCollum banks in halftime buzzer-beater) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: McCollum banks in halftime buzzer-beater

videos.description: Damian Lillard uses a step-back move to create space and drains a 3-pointer to give the Trail Blazers an 86-84 lead over the Nuggets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard drains step-back 3-pointer for the lead) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard drains step-back 3-pointer for the lead

videos.description: JaMychal Green nails a corner 3-pointer that sends the Nuggets' bench into a frenzy as they take a 103-98 lead over the Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (JaMychal Green's corner 3 ignites Nuggets' bench) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: JaMychal Green's corner 3 ignites Nuggets' bench

videos.description: Damian Lillard sinks the huge triple in the final seconds of regulation to force overtime in Game 5.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dame Time! Lillard's clutch 3 sends game to OT) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dame Time! Lillard's clutch 3 sends game to OT

videos.description: Damian Lillard banks in a deep triple to set the record for most 3-pointers in a postseason game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard sets NBA playoff record with 12th 3-pointer) 2021/06/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard sets NBA playoff record with 12th 3-pointer

videos.description: Damian Lillard drops 55 points and hits a pair of clutch shots, but the Trail Blazers still fall to the Nuggets in an instant classic.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Lillard's heroics in 55-point game not enough in 2OT loss to Nuggets) 2021/06/01 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Lillard's heroics in 55-point game not enough in 2OT loss to Nuggets
